website_summaries.verdict: A decent low-cost option to Rx sunglasses. Use these to reduce eye strain and protect eyes from harmful UV sun rays.
pros: Nicely reduced glare with a lens coating that blocks more than 99% of UVA and UVB rays
This is a terrific product that fills a market demand if you find prescription sunglasses to be too expensive
Flip-up feature is great when entering a shaded trail from bright sunlight
cons: Might want to superglue the rubber protector pieces since they will come off if you don't
Hard getting them on and off

customer_reviews.title: Prefer over the other leading brand because of the low profile clip
customer_reviews.text: These clip-on sunglasses are polarized to reduce glare with a lens coating that blocks more than 99 percent of UVA and UVB rays. They are made with polycarbonate material that is scratch resistant. The clips have a silicone coating to prevent scratching prescription glasses when attaching. I prefer these over the other brand because the clip is low profile; it's not as noticeable or visible as I thought judging from the pictures. They come in black for very bright, sunny days.
customer_reviews.author: Donald H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit on my metal frame
customer_reviews.text: These are PERFECT for my need & use. I have a metal frame and these fit perfect . . . Loved them so much I just ordered the Grey & Yellow !
customer_reviews.author: Pat_A

customer_reviews.title: Look and Work just fine!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife's glasses, look like they were made just for her glasses, fit perfect. Easy to clip on or off and a simple push moves lenses up or down . Seem to be really sturdy! A little expensive maybe but frames are made of metal, not plastic! Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: B. Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Work great.
customer_reviews.text: Strange how hard it is to find clip on sun glasses for your prescriptions. I tried several stores and no one had or they had the kind that you put on and can't flip up. You have to remove the whole thing if you go indoors. I got these and they work great. Easy to put on and flip the lens up. I found myself doing it 20 times a day. Unfortunately I lost the pair I ordered, somehow. I have now ordered another pair.
customer_reviews.author: TM3912

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful company to work with.
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery of a great product. The company followed up by email after delivery with a way to contact then should there be any problems with the clip on sunglasses during the 1 year warranty. These polarized clip on sunglasses are nice and dark and fit well over prescription glasses. The top mechanism looked rather large on the Amazon site, but it's not overly noticable when they are worn. After ordering a pair and seeing how nice they are, I promptly ordered 2 more! .
customer_reviews.author: S Martin

customer_reviews.title: Not good in sun
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why this gets so many good reviews. It's easy enough to use, and in general they're OK sunglasses. Problem is if you're facing anywhere towards the sun, you can barely see. It seems to enhance glare rather then reduce it. I don't get it.
customer_reviews.author: Alx

customer_reviews.title: Great functional clip-ons
customer_reviews.text: These are fairly large, lightweight lenses. Easy to attach and remove from my prescription glasses each time I use the car. Easy to flip up when I need to read a map. I tried several more stylish clip-ons that did not fit well to the curvature of my prescription glasses or that were not large enough to cover them completely. These are relatively flat and simple. I think they will work on almost any glasses, but they are not stylish.
customer_reviews.author: TexasTen

customer_reviews.title: Brightness relief
customer_reviews.text: The overall quality is good. The clip is secure and the lenses do a good job cutting down glare. The lenses fit my Persol lenses well. They do have the problem that most clip ons have: they let light in around the edges so that you see a reflection on the back of the clip on lens. I can see the reflection of the outside portions of my eyebrows. The only clip ons I've seen that may not have this problem are the Chemistrie Sunlenses. But for a tenth the cost, these HS Elements are good enough.
customer_reviews.author: T. A. Lenz

customer_reviews.title: Good product; great service
customer_reviews.text: These are simple flip up sunglasses. The manufacturer or seller has been remarkably diligent in making sure that I am satisfied with the product. He sent me links to videos demonstrating how to use the glasses and these videos were very helpful. The clip that holds the glasses to my car visor is simple and ingenious. It enhances the usability of the glasses. This seller understands the value of customer service. Good product; excellent service. I cannot ask for more than that.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Lemega

customer_reviews.title: Great Flip Up Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased several of these just in case I misplace one, then I know I'll have another one to use. Clips are easy to use and perfect fit for the shape of my glasses.
customer_reviews.author: KaiKev

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: I generally like these. They are lightweight and seem durable for the money. They flip up and down easily. I just wish there lenses themselves were less tall. They are much taller than my glasses, and they rub against my nose uncomfortably, making my nose itch. They would be just about perfect if they were 1/8th of an inch less tall.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Great clip on for driving!
customer_reviews.text: Product is as advertised & so far they work great. Comes with draw string pouch to protect them from getting scratched & a clip for the sun visor in the car for quick acces to them. Easy to attach to your glasses. I have photo-grey lenses (automatically darken when exposed to sun light), but in the car they never get dark due to the UV protection in the car windshield, so I need additional protection while driving and these work well.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Light and flexible.
customer_reviews.text: I used these every day in the summer. I lose that they are very light. Many times i forgot i had them on. Even with them flipped up when i was inside i did not realize i had them on. They worked great doing everything from using the commerical lawnmower to driving on the freeway. One time i put them in a pocket and the lenses bent. Thought they were gone. Nope they came right back.
customer_reviews.author: Richard P. Ashwood Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Flip Feature Convenience
customer_reviews.text: I love the flip up feature of this product. You don't have to take it on and off when you walk indoors (e.g. shopping, etc.). However I wish I could find it in a smaller size. The bottom touches my face so I need to push my glasses up occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: Babi

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to wear with my transition lenses when driving. They work quite well. I really like how lightweight they are. The customer service is great! I had emailed the company before ordering to ask if they would work with transition lenses as one of the reviews said they did not. I received a prompt reply that they would issue a full refund if they didn't work. They do work great however!!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret M.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to put on my prescription sunglasses to increase the darkness as my eyes are sensitive to light and my prescription glasses just didn't feel dark enough. Once I put these on I was able to see without having to squint while outside in the bright sun. These clip-on sunglasses feel light and comfortable. I like that I can flip them up if I need to without having to remove them. Would highly recommend these for anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Sciondar

customer_reviews.title: Rainy Days
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I give a 4 stars is because since I received them it has rained and been cloudy and I haven't really gotten to wear them in the sun. They are lite weight and cover my lenses on both pair of my glasses. It has a nice fabric case to keep them it. Come out Mr. Sun.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sipes

customer_reviews.title: Four stars
customer_reviews.text: I actually prefer these to my old prescription sunglasses and not only since they didn't cost me an arm and a leg like bifocal shades.They are very lightweight and did a good job cutting the glare on a bright sunny day, especially near water. The flip up feature came in handy when running inside. I did find them too dark on overcast days and wish I had paid attention to the reviewer who said the lenses made it hard to read the navigation system when driving because I couldn't see it either. For those kinds of situations the brown lenses might be a better option.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Cool shades
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these clip ons. They’re good quality. They’re a bit flexible vs rigid, which may be better to keep from breaking. I needed something quick to replace a pair of prescription sunglasses that I lost. These will work great until I can order new sunglasses. They also came with protective pouch and a clip to attach to car sun visor to keep them when not using. Great price too. I’m very satisfied with these and would recommend them. I just received them a few days ago so can’t comment on how durable they are, but anything else, if you take care of them they should last (at least until I lose these too).
customer_reviews.author: Steve A

customer_reviews.title: 10 stars plus rating
customer_reviews.text: If anything it’s hard to get dark sunglasses 🕶 clipons. I’m very satisfied with this item. It has 2 cushions stems that does not touch the Prescription glasses. Actually, it was a previous young man who had given a video demonstration which comes i prescription glasses. Actually, it was a previous young man who had given video demonstration which Convince me to buy this. Thank you very much!
customer_reviews.author: Senior Person

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shades
customer_reviews.text: When they say for sunny days they aren't kidding. They a far more tinted than they look. The flip mechanism is very smooth. I can flip it up and down without my eyeglasses moving at all. They fit my eyeglass lens almost exactly. Gonna get a lighter color for overcast days. Possibly even yellow for night driving. It's nice having perfect vision with shades. It's a good affordable alternative to RX sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Road Tripper

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Clip-on and best customer service!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. Not only the Clip on but their "Customer Service". I had a pair for almost a year and used them on a daily basis, the clip came loose and I contacted them via email. The reply came back within 10 minutes. That's unheard of. They refunded me the full price right away, no questions asked and, I ordered a new pair since they are so awesome! Let me say this again, their customer service is outstanding! Thanks for backing up your product.
customer_reviews.author: Msiles01

customer_reviews.title: BEST EVER CLIP-ON SUNGLASSES
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS PRODUCT! I researched many choices on Amazon. I especially appreciated the video... the many features this has, and it fits over my prescription glasses perfectly. Doesn't look like a "cover" Also, they flip up so I can go in and out of my house, store, etc. and it is easy peasy!
customer_reviews.author: carol la

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: One of the reasons that I ordered these clip on glasses out of the many to choose from was that the picture and description shows it coming with a visor clip which I needed. It did not come with a visor clip but instead a cloth bag to keep the shades in. Shades fit really well and work as described but couldn't give a five star rating because it didn't come as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lovelady

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvement.
customer_reviews.text: I have only used these clips on sunglasses one time. I found it difficult to separate the clips of these sunglasses so they could get over the lenses of my eyeglasses. Perhaps the process gets easier if the clips loosen up. In the course of trying to get these clips over my lenses, the rubber tips on the clips fell off. I mainly need these for driving, and it would be impractical to quickly slip the clips on over my glasses and that situation.​
customer_reviews.author: Big Blue

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband because he lost his previous pair of the exact same. He is really happy with them and asked if I would please order him another pair. He loves them for driving, fishing, etc..... The clip is great for him because he tends to live out of his truck and they would otherwise get lost in there.They seem very durable and he is almost never without them. I should probably order another pair to keep on hand when he is driving my car.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Parkinson

customer_reviews.title: A very pleasant surprise
customer_reviews.text: The ElementsActive Polarized Clip-on Driving Sunglasses with Flip Up Function were very much a WELCOME surprise. I've ordered several on here and they 'crap'. These are not only easy to 'clip on', but the antiglare and UVA features are very effective. The flexibility of the lenses are also a great feature. Overall, these are VERY good quality flip-ups and the clarity is superior to others on offer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and very effective
customer_reviews.text: These clip-on sunglasses are very well made and fit my prescription glasses perfectly. They cut the glare and make driving in bright light much safer. I bought the darkest shade. The flip-up feature is so handy, too. I like these so much I am ordering the brown shade next.
customer_reviews.author: loves2read

customer_reviews.title: Great level of tint and durable
customer_reviews.text: Very durable polycarb clip on sunglasses. They clean easily and store easily (clip is included). The anti-glare and tint are phenomenal; these are definitely very dark which is a big plus. I knew the dimensions prior to purchasing but I wish there was a slimmer version as when putting these on, inside edges actually rest on my nose.
customer_reviews.author: Kpanas

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but be careful
customer_reviews.text: This item works good. Not bad. The tint ion it is really dark, but I like the option it has for be versatile. One thing be careful with the rubber grips where it snaps on your glasses, they come off VERY easy. I've already lost 1-2. Which leaves a metal arm against glass with no rubber feet. Otherwise good
customer_reviews.author: J.L.O

customer_reviews.title: Too Dark
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the function of the clip, but for me the glasses are too dark even on bright day. I went for a walk through a local park with them and ended up removing them after about 10 minutes or so because I found them unpleasant. Also the unit acts a bit like a mirror and has bluish glare reflection in the peripheral.
customer_reviews.author: Hubert Gaskins

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay clipped
customer_reviews.text: The clip on glasses DO NOT stay on. If you move your head too fast, these clip on glasses move. If you try to flip them up, they come off. I had a much less expensive pair that fit snug and did not move until you wanted to. Unfortunately, I gave them to my grandson and then found the others were no longer available. If you plan on any type of activity other than just sitting, I would NOT recommend these clip ons.
customer_reviews.author: Grandmother of 9

customer_reviews.title: nice and dark but yet I can see my dash ...
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money. Crystal clear lens, nice and dark but yet I can see my dash info... easy to remove and put back on. I'm a sun dodger and get "eye headaches" when its too bright outside and it drains me. I prefer to put them on with both hands and with my glasses off so I know I am perfectly aligned...why this is earth shattering to some I dunno...its no big deal...lol. They stay in place and are Polarized, block UV AND are scratch resistant. I paid $15 a year ago for a pair at Walmart and they weren't as clear and scratched as well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.  Good view through them and level of tinting.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair adding one to keep in my wifes car. They closely fit the shape of my RX glasses. Easy on and off and can be flipped up. Good holder for visor. I like and use these over my RX sunglasses. Arrive well packaged by manufacture including visor clip and cloth bag for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a pair and a silicone scratch resistant plug would consistently pop off. I was lucky to be able to retrieve it on the ground, however, it eventually fell off again, and it got lost. I notified the seller. They were really good in sending me out a new pair. The new pair appeared to have longer and better silicone plugs. I also like the visor clip they give to secure the glasses in the car. Overall, these glasses are exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Frank G.

customer_reviews.title: Great polarization and one hand use
customer_reviews.text: The clip at the top is a little ugly and takes a while to get used to, but the polarizing and ease of use make it worth it. Everything looks really clear and beautiful through these, so perfect for sightseeing and any outdoor activity where you want to enjoy the scenery and be able to see clearly without glare. The single hand clipping on and off is really handy cause I use this while riding my bike, so I have to be able to do it one handed.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: They do the job!
customer_reviews.text: We live in the desert southwest, so shades are practically required during the day. We ordered these for my husband who works as a driver for a program for special needs adults as his auto-darkening shades don't get dark enough to protect his vision. These do the job and fit nicely over his prescription frames.
customer_reviews.author: JylM

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap and distorted plastic
customer_reviews.text: Plastic is flimsy and cheap and vision distorted and way too dark for driving. Clip broke after 2 uses...would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Randy S. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Seemed okay and had a clip to hold on sun visor which was nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my father along with others to try. These covered his lens fine but the other pair was the same price and had a metal frame around the edges. With him being 92 I just felt the sturdiest pair was best so I returned these.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Four thumbs-up!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband, and he loves them! He has sun-darkening prescription glasses, but still finds the glare of sunlight too much when driving. These polarized clip-ons do the trick. Highly recommended; I'm getting him another pair for our other car.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Phalen

customer_reviews.title: Sunglasses fit well over regular glasses.
customer_reviews.text: Fits on my glasses well without damaging them and is helpful when driving because I wear prescription glasses when driving and use these clip on sunglasses when the sun is bright while driving.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: A bit heavy1
customer_reviews.text: I wear thin frame glasses (titanium or flexor - type) very light weight materials. These clip-ons weigh down the frame significantly which compromises the fit and comfort. Should you have a thick/robust framed glass - this might work.
customer_reviews.author: Pass-port in hand

customer_reviews.title: Too big for my face
customer_reviews.text: I liked them There wasn't a thing wrong with them other than they are just too big for my glasses and face. I wanted to keep them but they just didn't look good on me and i could feel them.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses work perfectly with my reading glasses - no more annoying glare on my book pages when I read outdoors! They are easy to operate and I like the clip that comes with them, too. Although I don't use them for driving (I wear regular sunglasses), they are exactly what I need for the beach and back yard. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product Great service
customer_reviews.text: The design and build quality are excellent. The oversized lenses cover my eyeglass frames creating a sleek look. Great glare reduction. Best of all was the service: I had some minor trouble with my initial unit that I had for a few months. The company credited me my original cost and sent me an Amazon gift credit for a replacement at a large discount.
customer_reviews.author: Peter B

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Great warranty service.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased both clip-on sunglasses and the one that you put over your glasses. Definitely go for clip-on type. I used this everyday and the clip-on parts in the middle of the glasses came off. Contacted the seller if I'm qualified for the warranty service after 9 months of purchase and they offered me a full refund in order to re-purchase this product within 1 hour. I would give 4 stars for broken after 9 months but the response time and hassle-free made up for it
customer_reviews.author: BM

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT PRODUCT!!! I was having issues hitting the ball square as I am an avid softball player. Wearing my prescription glasses during sunny days produced way too much glare. Started using these wonderful clip ons and I went 5 for 5 in my first game! Love them! Had the same issue driving with my prescription glasses, just too much glare, so now I use these and I can see everything now. I feel much more safe driving and can read the road signs now!
customer_reviews.author: RED

customer_reviews.title: Even worse, the inner surfaces of these sunglasses (the side ...
customer_reviews.text: NOT polarized! All the reflections from glass, windows, liquid surfaces, and other shiny surfaces are all there. Even worse, the inner surfaces of these sunglasses (the side that facing your eyes) themselves are reflective. So when you wear them on a sunny day, you can see the reflections of your own eyes, you can also see the reflections of other bright objects behind you. Very distracting and annoying. I guess they are good only if you are sitting in cars and driving. Not good for daily uses.
customer_reviews.author: Benn

customer_reviews.title: Finally, clip-ons that really work right
customer_reviews.text: I broke my old clip-ons and bought these. I only wish I broke my old ones sooner. These are sooooo much better. First they have rubber clip-ons instead of plastic so they hold better. Second, they clamp onto my frames instead of just sliding over them. This means they don't move around when you flip them up. With the old ones I had to constantly adjust them. With these--no need to. Finally, they're adequately dark. With the Arizona sun I need more than a little light tint. These clip-ons are really great!
customer_reviews.author: Frank T. Klus

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: The clip and hinge works perfectly and doesn't seem to scratch my lenses. The polarized lenses aren't a perfect fit for my prescription glasses, but I didn't really expect that. They do provide adequate coverage. They aren't as curved as the underlying lens but I don't notice any distortion around the edges where there is a gap. Short of having clip-ons provided by the same manufacturer as the prescription glasses (and tailored to that particular model) this is the best there is.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick A. McCombs

customer_reviews.title: This is the best clip on that I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is the best clip on that I've ever had. They are simple to attach and they fit my new glasses perfectly. The polarization makes them easy on the eyes on bright sunny days. Good product,packaged well. It even comes with a cloth bag to keep them in, when they are not being used.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rubenstein

customer_reviews.title: Works as Described
customer_reviews.text: One deficiency is any explanation or instructions on how to fasten them to a pair of glasses. I had to go to a YouTube video from someone else to see how exactly to put them on. Once they were securely on they worked just great.
customer_reviews.author: James Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: clip on sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: it's a very practical way to have sunglasses on your prescription glasses. They work well but not durable a rubber piece on the left side clip-on fell off and now it can scratch the lens.
customer_reviews.author: Steve's comments

customer_reviews.title: Wish I’d found these sooner ! Love !!
customer_reviews.text: These are so easy to clip onto the eye glasses & fit like they were made for them . They feel sturdy enough to handle my 17yr old special needs son. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for the price and a year warranty.
customer_reviews.text: I am quite satisfied with this purchase. One of the reasons is it has a year warranty and the other is Amazon delivered this purchase 2 days early. Element active must be a legitimate company since they provide a year warranty on a product that can be scratched and broken easily. I hope these clip on sunglasses last a long time since they were less than $15 and they offer the same eye protection as $100-$300 sun glasses.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product for me tor two reasons: first, I get around with a cane, and therefore my one hand is occupied. With this set of Clip-ons, I don't have to change from regular glasses to sun glasses; I just flip the Clip-ons down into position; and second, they're much more economical than a separate set of sun glasses. They're lightweight and easy to use, and when in place they stay there.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Winkler

customer_reviews.title: Good lenses. Cheap clip.
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are overall pretty good. They had to be adjusted a bit because my lenses are different thicknesses on each side. So when originally when putting them on they would only clip tightly to the thick lense. But after adjusting its fine. The clip however is SUPER CHEAP it literally broke apart on me one day when getting the lenses out from it. Now it just hangs open and so I have to store the lenses elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect clip-on sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: This clip-on lenses are truly dark (black), easy to attach and they completely cover my glasses. I looked at the measurements provided by the seller before selecting this. After wearing them all afternoon in the bright sun, I did not have any discomfort (eye-strain or headache). I am very happy with this purchase and would not be paying hundreds of dollars for the prescription sunglasses in future.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Better products available at less cost
customer_reviews.text: VERY lightweight and basically little more than cheap plastic. As advertised, you also get a visor clip made of even CHEAPER plastic. If the visor clip doesn't break in the first week of use, I will be amazed. When I ordered this item, I also purchased the Torege clip-on, flip up Polarized sunglasses on Amazon. They are better made, easier to install and come with a case. A much better product and cheaper, too.
customer_reviews.author: Tula Kavadias

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I wear plastic frame glasses with very thick lenses. I wasn't sure if these would work on my glasses but they fit perfectly. I have transition lenses but they don't change in the car and I need something to block out the sun. I highly recommend these for anyone looking for the perfect clip on sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Brady

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for prescription glass owners.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. One size fits all so don't expect it to be perfectly matched to your glasses, but they did a great job of making it cover the necessary area. After a few times I got where I could put them on my glasses without taking my glasses off. I'm now officially old wearing these things! haha But they work great and were priced well.
customer_reviews.author: E. Wrye

customer_reviews.title: I like this forthe value versus hundred for transisiin lenses
customer_reviews.text: I like this forthe value versus hundred for transisiin lenses. I di however see a glare off my glasses when i wer then, but they are darker than my regular sunglasses and in Arizona the sun is quit damaging. I do notice less glare of chrome vehucles poslised wyh our bright sun.
customer_reviews.author: Momaleia

customer_reviews.title: Choose the right shade carefully.  It makes a difference.
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I needed. I had prescription sunglasses but the prescription was no longer effective as they were several years old. Along come ElementsActive which clip right on to my new prescription glasses and I'm back in business at a fraction of the cost. I am very satisfied and will recommend them. Note: If you are a fisherman as I am and the sun will be in front of you, get the black lenses. If the sun will ne at your back or from the side, get the brown lenses.
customer_reviews.author: David N.

customer_reviews.title: Clearer vision
customer_reviews.text: I don't like clip-ons, but I needed these and they work nicely. They are polarized which cuts out the glare. Easy to clamp on and remove and they fit fairly well on my glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Safe and Easy too.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my husband because he was constantly having to remove his other one's and it was, not only inconvenient but dangerous. These he just flips up and they stay until he needs them again and he flips them down...Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Regina B. Rohlfing

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: These are just what I needed. Fit perfectly over my glasses, have a convenient clip for the sunvisor to keep them accessible, and are actually polarized lenses. Best thing I've purchased in a while and have already proven to be a must have for my morning commute.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Evans

customer_reviews.title: light weight.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these mainly for boating to reduce the water's glare. These glasses are great. enhanced definition and color. I recommend these glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping to like these, especially with all the good reviews. But these give a lot of glare from my glasses. I like the style of them. They are comfortable and easy to use. They cover my glasses good, but I think there is a gap because they are not snug to glasses and causes a glare for me. From my experience using these, I would not recommend due to glare.
customer_reviews.author: debm

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: Polarized and perfect fit! These easily clip on and flip up if you need to switch from sunglasses to glasses. So far they are wonderful and just what I wanted. They come with a handy visor clip so you can safely store them.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L Olsen

customer_reviews.title: My husband is so happy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these sunglasses for my husband. They are perfect for his glasses. He doesn't like glasses that transition. He also doesn't like the other type of spring loaded clipons where you need to use two hands to attach them (and then have no place to put them when you take them off). With these, he can instantly clip them on when he goes outside and when he walks back inside he can flip them up or clip them to his shirt or pocket so he doesn't lose them. He is so happy!
customer_reviews.author: Alison L. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the sun blind you
customer_reviews.text: It isn't the most flattering thing to wear but when I'm in the car and the sun is blinding me, I couldn't care less how I look as long as I can drive safely and have a clear view of the road in front of me. This works with those thick plastic rimmed glasses and it is easy to put on and take off. The clip that it comes with is also very handy. Fantastic quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ananda Hongsa

customer_reviews.title: These broke
customer_reviews.text: These broke two months after we bought them. My husband was putting them back inside the sleeve they came with when the lens snapped off.
customer_reviews.author: Augusta

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasey
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews on this product before ordering and was a little apprehensive because some reviews said they were somewhat difficult to attach. After trying it out I don't know what the big deal is! They are easy to attach and fit my Wayfarer prescription glasses perfectly. It's cloudy here today so I don't know how they work in the sun but so far I think this is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Seven777

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got them......
customer_reviews.text: They work well....and the price is right. Customer service was excellent.... I feel like a PRO BASEBALL player now....ha ha
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Steinberg

customer_reviews.title: Great product, I drive school buses and this saves ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I drive school buses and this saves my issue with sun glare as the seasons change, and the flip up is handy for shaded areas. The dark shade does mask dark autos with out headlights so the flip up is handy when not in direct sunlight. As described I found. Easy to fit on my glasses, light weight & shipping was two days. I recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to break
customer_reviews.text: I used it for a week and it broke. The spring mechanism is much too flimsy. Edited to add: The company sent me a free pair after reading my 1 star review. After a month of testing, the free pair last longer. The spring mechanism on the first pair I bought was pretty weak and flimsy. Consistency of this product, in particular the strength of the spring, seems to be a problem. Ymmv.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Lai

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This clip on fits perfectly. Previous one was too big and hit my nose. Always use it outdoors. SL
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Great for driving and cycling!
customer_reviews.text: It's super sunny in California! I used to ride my bike to work and would always be blind by the sun. These shades are so helpful and they're insanely light weight. You don't even notice they're on. They're also so flexible that they've survived my clumsy self.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Gruber

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: works very well at lowering the glare from the sun here in north Florida.seems to also reduce windshield glare from on coming cars.so far i like this product very much.
customer_reviews.author: thomas oneill

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit and UV protection.
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased well beyond my expectations. They fit my bi-focal glasses almost perfectly. The UV protection is excellent as I used them today in a cloudy day looking at the mountains away 15 - 20 miles away. I strongly recommend this item. VIA
customer_reviews.author: Vassilios A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shades!
customer_reviews.text: These shades are perfect for my needs especially for my walks on bright cool days. Customer service is exceptional and this company will do what they promised. You won’t be sorry with your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Emerald ice 55

customer_reviews.title: and nice glasses bag that doubles as a lens cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be a high quality product. Arrived very quickly with clear directions, warranty registration instructions, and nice glasses bag that doubles as a lens cleaner. I've used many clip-on sunglasses for my prescription glasses in the past, and this may prove to be the best product I've used so far.
customer_reviews.author: SMO

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Fits my eyeglasses nicely. Love how it can flip up when not In use. Leave it in my car and can easily attach to my glasses while driving. Seem sturdy. Only con is they are very dark and darken up everything. Unless it is a very sunny day I don't use them or I just flip them up in shadowy areas.
customer_reviews.author: online shopper

customer_reviews.title: but these work great over my rimless progressives and seem to be well ...
customer_reviews.text: Only used a few times so far. However, I was not expecting much, but these work great over my rimless progressives and seem to be well made, durable and convenient. Found cheaper alternative but their description did not seem to be certified UV A AND B plus mechanism appeared all plastic which does not last in Phoenix AZ. I bought primarily for driving and in black and they are VERY dark but in the very sunny desert for me was the right choice. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Edward T. Portschell

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these. I bought another pair from another company ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these. I bought another pair from another company and they were nowhere NEAR as resilient or well-made as these are. I'm thoroughly impressed; they block the sun perfectly, but aren't so dark that I can't see anything. I bought another pair for my dad for Father's day and he loves them too!
customer_reviews.author: Des Barker

customer_reviews.title: Not My Next Choice
customer_reviews.text: Clip on point broke a few mints after using, right after I couldn’t return. Not as clear viewing as I hope for!
customer_reviews.author: R-LO

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: These worked pretty well but I suffer from migraines and unfortunately they were not that dark
customer_reviews.author: Seanhanthorn

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses clip-on!
customer_reviews.text: My husband lost a pair of clip-ons and we could not find the old brand anywhere. I finally settled for this item and it's absolutely perfect! They are a little smaller than the other pair which is a much welcomed feature since they fit the glasses they clip to much better! They were not packaged well at all so I was thrilled they were not bent or broken on arrival. Great value priced item!
customer_reviews.author: ATLshopper

customer_reviews.title: Product is what it says it is.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my husband. He loves them and they fit beautifully and comfortably over his glasses. I recommend highly recommended these clip on sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki B.

customer_reviews.title: Best buy
customer_reviews.text: I had irritation on my eye and could not wear contacts. Sensitive to the sun and had to buy this to protect my eyes from the sunlight sensitivity.
customer_reviews.author: KaiM

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: These glasses where exactly what I was looking for. They do a great job of blocking the sun's glare and the flip-up feature is great for those times you need to look at something that is not directly in the sun, or to read a digital display that can be washed out by the tint. the case and visor clip were just plain frosting on the cake and make them more convenient to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mystery Buff

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight. Don't pull glasses down.
customer_reviews.text: What I especially like about these glasses is that aren't so heavy that the cause my glasses to slip down my nose. It takes some experimentation and practice to master attaching and detaching, but overall I'm very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: G. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: They work great!
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for, my husband needed something as he goes in and out of the building a lot and needed something that would easily work with his safety glasses with the side shields. These are wonderful and are a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: One tiny flaw...
customer_reviews.text: One of the protective rubber covers came off of the clip and was lost almost immediately. This meant they didn't stay in place as well as I would have liked. But I loved being able to flip up the sunglasses to take photos. Edit - I bumped up my review from 3 stars to 4 because the seller contacted me within hours of my posting this review.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Santucci

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Much better than my old clip-ons. These fit my glasses better--so they don't look so obviously like clip-ons. Plus they're darker and Polarized. I've only had them for a few days, but so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: A Perfect Fit and Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure from the picture, that these would fit my new eyeglasses but the dimensions were very accurate and they fit perfectly. They are also just the right darkness and they cut out glare beautifully. Well made and I think they will hold up for quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: M.R.

customer_reviews.title: Work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Just wish the clampdown feature was a little stiffer to hold the lenses in place.
customer_reviews.author: Camera Buff

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. I think I was expecting the polarized lens cover to block a bit more of the UV rays. Maybe that's not possible. It says it flips up, but when I try, I flip them off my glasses. It is, however, better than not having a polarized lens. The product arrived in good time. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Jax Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels flimsy - works great
customer_reviews.text: I have never used this type of flip up sunglass thingy before. At first I was concerned that it was so flimsy that it would not work. Although it doesn't fit my frame perfectly I was surprised how well it worked. My first trial was a five hour marathon soccer day in the bright sun up in the mountains. It was a squint free day and hey worked very well. I was surprised and grateful for this product
customer_reviews.author: Gary Flanders

customer_reviews.title: Does not work on rimless glasses
customer_reviews.text: I can't use them at all. They keep sliding off of my glasses. Perhaps if my glasses were rimmed, they would be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Barnhill
